Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Victim_%281980_film%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Victim_%281980_film%29</a>

From start to finish this film delivers where it counts. With a combination of comedy,revenge and hardcore hand to hand and weapon combat, this film is in a class of it's own.
You get just what you expect from the legendary Samo Hung and Leung Kar Yan, unbeatable fight choreagraphy and fine perfomances. Unlike many kung fu movies this film has an addictive story line with many twists to a very good plot.
This is certainly one of the best martial arts movies ever made, and is for the serious kung fu movie fan!
